title: Power interruption schedule for tomorrow
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) has approved power cuts of over 5 hours for tomorrow (April 03), as requested by the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB).
The CEB had requested interruptions to the electricity supply due to the limited supply of fuel for thermal power plants.
E 03-04-2022 Power Interruption Schedule Full by Ada Derana on Scribd
